# The Pipe

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dr_theobold |>
  do_a_dance()
```

--

```{r, eval = FALSE}
dr_theobold |>
  put_on("cool hat") |>
  do_a_dance(type = "macarena")
```

# The Pipe

```{r, echo = FALSE}
decorate('cereals |> summary()', eval = FALSE) |> 
  flair("|>") |> 
  flair_funs(color = "teal")
```

is the same as

```{r, echo = FALSE}
decorate('summary(cereals)', eval = FALSE) |> 
  flair_funs(color = "teal")
```

# The Pipe

What do you think the following will do?

```{r, eval = FALSE}
cereals |>
  filter(mfr == "Q") |>
  arrange(calories)
```

--

```{r, echo = FALSE}
cereals |>
  filter(mfr == "Q") |>
  arrange(calories)
```


---

# The Pipe

What do you think the following will do?

```{r, eval = FALSE}
cereals |>
  filter(mfr == "Q") |>
  group_by(temp) |> 
  arrange(sugars)
```


--

```{r, echo = FALSE}
cereals |>
  filter(mfr == "Q") |>
  group_by(temp) |> 
  arrange(sugars) 
```
